revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = 2-port Switch Wireless AP+print server |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Senao |model = SL-2511AP |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 1 PLUS / B |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = F200 |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, print server |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = NI3-2511SR, NI3-2511CD-PLUS3 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 34-WIP402-A2 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = RDC;R8822; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = x86 |cpu1spd = <!-- 40 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;HY29F040AC-90; |flash1size = 0.5 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 0.5 |ram1chip = GLT;GLT44016-35J4; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8019AS; |sw1chip = Kendin;KS8995; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:50:18 |oui = 00:02:6F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = PCMCIA (16-bit),Parallel |exp_pcmcia_num = 1 |exp_parallel = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = print server |addchip = DC/DC Converter Control Circuits;RichTek;RT34063A;;1; ,,, 30V P-Channel PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS9435A;;1; ,,, 3A Low Dropout Positive Adjustable Regulator;ANPEC;APL1085;;2; ,,, Octal Buffer/Line 3-State Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LS244;;2; ,,, Hex Inverting Schmitt Trigger;Texas Instruments;SN74HC14;;1; ,,, Quad 2-Input AND Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74F08;;1; |802dot11_protocols = b
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = AMIT |manuf_model = WIP402 |manuf_rev = A2 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/08/2002 |estreldate = 08/12/2002 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Senao SL-2511CD PLUS EXT2 |rad1modif = PCMCIA (16-bit) |rad1chip1 = Intersil;ISL3873B; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;ISL3685; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MMCX |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :aka ''[[EnGenius]]'' EL-2511AP1 PLUS / PLUS (200)
"34-WIP402-A2" and "Ver. A2" is silkscreened on the board. {{See also|Senao SL-2511SR}}
==Links of Interest== ===Teardown=== *[http://www.sorgonet.com/network/senao2511hack/ ''Hacking a Senao SL-2511AP1 Plus'' on '''SorgoNet'''] :(presumed) 2x 10/100 ports via the ''[[Kendin]]'' switch, :10Mbit uplink to the ''[[RDC]]'' R8822 CPU *[https://www.natthapol89.com/2014/04/senao-sl-2511ap1-plusbf200.html ''Senao SL-2511AP1 Plus'' on '''natthapol89''' blog] :CPU: [[RDC]] [http://www.paradigmtools.com/docs/R8822.PDF R8822], Switch: [[Kendin]] KS8995 :WLAN: [[Senao SL-2511CD PLUS EXT2]] (E100)
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:SL-2511AP1 PLUS board top.jpg| File:SL-2511AP1 PLUS board bottom.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
